Import key pair process (preference not active yet)

This is a very basic and ugly import key pair process which uses the same
procedure of key regeneration, but instead it sends the imported key to the
server, which will accept it as valid.
Actual user interaction is still missing, it will be implemented soon.
After that, importing will be implemented also for the registration phase.

Import key from existing key pack archive during registration (UNTESTED)

The user will then continue to register normally, but Kontalk will use the
imported keys instead of letting the server signing it. The key is sent to
the server nonetheless because it needs to authenticate it.

DownloadService: use database ID instead of server ID

Using the server ID will make the DownloadService update
the local_uri for all messages with that server ID. This
led to updating the outgoing message too if the message
was sent to ourselves (I know, silly case, yet it's a bug)

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>
